law.catch_line: Recommendation of adoption or rejection of proposals -- Adoption upon recommendation of rejection, statement of reason.
law.text: In any matter prepared and proposed to the commission for its recommendation pursuant to KRS 224.10-100 and 224.1-110, such recommendation shall be effected by the affirmative vote of a majority of the members of the commission present and voting. The commission shall tender in writing its recommendation of adoption or rejection. If the cabinet adopts any matter upon the commission's recommendation of rejection, the secretary shall file with the commission a statement of the reason therefor.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, secs. 1 and 13(2), effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 6, effective January 1, 1973.
